thread.title: Ground News - No, These Images Do Not Show a Library Opened in Dr BR Ambedkar’s Name in US
thread.title_full: Ground News - No, These Images Do Not Show a Library Opened in Dr BR Ambedkar’s Name in US

author: The Quint
title: Ground News - No, These Images Do Not Show a Library Opened in Dr BR Ambedkar’s Name in US
text:
Summary by The Quint A set of images is being shared on social media platforms to claim that it shows that the world's largest library in the United States that has been opened in the name of Dr BR Ambedkar. The claim: The images were uploaded with a caption in Hindi, which loosely translates to, "America opened the world's largest library in the name of India's messiah Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar!."An archive of the post can be found here.(More archives of similar claims… Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right

The claim: The images were uploaded with a caption in Hindi, which loosely translates to, "America opened the world's largest library in the name of India's messiah Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar!."An archive of the post can be found here.(More archives of similar claims…
